rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment contains a neutral economic projection.
The segment reports on financial/trade metrics ('exports will reach up to 5.3 million tons'), which are Neutral.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports a positive economic fact without explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation or statement of uncertainty/low risk.
The segment states exports will reach a certain amount, describing a future possibility/economic outcome.
